feed.title: Tipi Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Tipi: v3.5.2
entry.content:
Release notes

Improvements - Disabled app backups in demo mode - Disable error reports when the issue is due to a custom user config

Technical - Bump dependencies - Isolate db client in it's own package - Move to biome.js for linting and formatting

How to update

From the root folder of your Tipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v3.5.2

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 2 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue encountered so we can fix it as soon as possible.

entry.title: New release for Tipi: v3.5.3
entry.content:
Improvements - Add a "new" badge in the app-store to recently added apps @sergi0g - Add support for colors in log terminal

Technical - Add support for docker-compose.arm64.json files @steveiliop56 - Remove prettier and eslint in favor of biome.js @meienberger - Isolate redis cache in its own package @meienberger - Bump dependencies

How to update

From the root folder of your Tipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v3.5.3

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 2 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue you encounter so we can fix it immediately.

entry.title: New release for Tipi: v3.6.0
entry.content:
Release notes

New features - New button in settings to force pull the app store repo instead of waiting 30 min

Improvements - Sort backup list newest -> oldest - Add support for base64 random values

Fixes - When changing local domain, previous certificate was not cleaned up correctly preventing to re-generate it when switching back to the previous domain

Technical - Bump dependencies

How to update

From the root folder of your Tipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v3.6.0

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 2 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue you encounter so we can fix it immediately.

entry.title: New release for Tipi: v3.6.1
entry.content:
Release notes

New features - Allow to set custom LOG_LEVEL in user .env

Fixes - App status not correctly set when action fail - Some app backups failing silently and crashing the system - App store too many file opened in the backend - Add missing translated strings in the frontend

Technical - Bump dependencies - Upgrade compose plugin to v2.29.2

How to update

From the root folder of your Tipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v3.6.1

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 2 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue you encounter so we can fix it immediately.

entry.title: New release for Tipi: v3.6.2
entry.content:
Release notes

improvements - Add more options for docker-compose.json - Updated translations in various languages

Technical - Upgrade to traefik v3.1.4 - Upgrade compose plugin to v2.29.7 - Bump dependencies

How to update

From the root folder of your Tipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v3.6.2

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 2 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue you encounter so we can fix it immediately.
